Literature.Title: Characterization of Iturin V, a Novel Antimicrobial Lipopeptide from a Potential Probiotic Strain Lactobacillus sp. M31
Literature.Author: Singh SS, Akhtar MN, Sharma D, Mandal SM, Korpole S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml,Bone marrow–derived dendritic cells (BMDCs):15% Cytotoxicity=125 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio cholerae MTCC 3904(MIC=25µg/ml),Vibrio fluvialis MTCC 4432(MIC=35µg/ml),Vibrio mimicus MTCC 4434(MIC=40µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus MTCC 4439(MIC=35µg/ml),Vibrio vulnificus MTCC 1146(MIC=30µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus MTCC 451(MIC=35µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 1934(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens MTCC 103(MIC=30µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 183(MIC=36µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 227(MIC=36µg/ml),Candida tropicalis MTCC 184(MIC=48µg/ml),Candida glabrata MTCC 3019(MIC=90µg/ml),Candida haemulonii MTCC 2766(MIC=36µg/ml),Candida inconspicua MTCC 1074(MIC=36µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma Caco-2(10-20% Cytotoxicity=125µg/ml)
